name: @cf/deepgram/aura-1
description: Aura is a context-aware text-to-speech (TTS) model that applies natural pacing, expressiveness, and fillers based on the context of the provided text. The quality of your text input directly impacts the naturalness of the audio output.

task.name: Text-to-Speech
task.description: Text-to-Speech (TTS) is the task of generating natural sounding speech given text input. TTS models can be extended to have a single model that generates speech for multiple speakers and multiple languages.

speaker.description: Speaker used to produce the audio.

container.description: Container specifies the file format wrapper for the output audio. The available options depend on the encoding type..

text.description: The text content to be converted to speech

sample_rate.description: Sample Rate specifies the sample rate for the output audio. Based on the encoding, different sample rates are supported. For some encodings, the sample rate is not configurable

bit_rate.description: The bitrate of the audio in bits per second. Choose from predefined ranges or specific values based on the encoding type.

output.description: The generated audio in MP3 format
